text: Ohe yara imana enecha! Se-saba bisaya sanbandhe prasna karo na ya tomadera kache byakta karale tomadera asubidha hate pare. Ara yadi tomara se-saba bisaye prasna karo ye samaye kura'ana abatirna hacche tabe tomadera jan'ya byakta kara habe. Allah eti theke mapha karechena, kenana allah paritranakari, ati amayika.
